text: @realDonaldTrump NY has had almost 15,000 confirmed coronavirus deaths, you fuckin monster. We had to scrounge for ventilators from around the globe, had to splice them to share with 2 patients, & we aren’t out of the woods yet. 1000s of people may have lived if you had adequately supplied us.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
